00009 //Use these values when specifically replacing a wall with new type.
00010 enum {      //Wall tile types
00011       INTERIOR_L,                                                       //interior wall with a top left orientation
00012       INTERIOR_R,                                                       //interior wall with a top right orientation
00013       EXTERIOR_L,                                                       //exterior wall with a top left orientation
00014       EXTERIOR_R,                                                       //exterior wall with a top right orientation
00015       INTERIOR_CORNER,                                      //special interior end piece with top left orientation.
00016       //The rest of these walls are special wall tiles for top right orientations.
00017       INTERIOR_BOTTOMEND,                                   //interior wall for bottom corner 
00018       EXTERIOR_BOTTOMEND,                                   //exterior wall for bottom corner 
00019       INTERIOR_EXTENDED,                                    //extended interior wall for top corner
00020       EXTERIOR_EXTENDED,                                    //extended exterior wall for top corner
00021       INTERIOR_EXTENDED_BOTTOMEND,  //extended interior wall for both top and bottom corners.
00022       EXTERIOR_EXTENDED_BOTTOMEND,  //extended exterior wall for both top and bottom corners.
00023       NUM_WALL_TYPES 
00024 };
